contents.text: Welcome to Bexi, your scalable and hassle-free design partner in the East Bay.
To learn about our flexible pricing packages, press 1.
To hear details of our subscription plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly review subscription options and sign up for the right plan
I’d like to learn about subscription plans and any veteran discounts for my small business.
Get a detailed breakdown of Bexi’s subscription tiers with included design hours, overage rates, and billing cadence.
Could you walk me through your subscription pricing plans?
I want to review subscription plan options and benefits for student research projects.

contents.text: To speak with a pricing specialist, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: Get a custom quote on pricing for an upcoming design engagement
I want to speak with a pricing specialist about customized rates for my veteran-led nonprofit.
Connect with a pricing specialist to discuss a custom enterprise package and volume‐discount options.
Please connect me with someone to discuss pricing options.
I need to discuss custom pricing for bulk printing of research posters.

contents.text: For on-demand project fulfillment and new design requests, press 2.
To submit a new design project, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our project intake team.

navigationGoals: Upload details for a new design project I need completed
I need to submit a new design brief for a brochure and logo for my veteran outreach program.
Submit a new design project request for our React Native app’s onboarding flow, including vector icon assets and annotated wireframes.
I’d like to submit a new design project request.
I want to submit a new design request for my physics conference poster.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing project, press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your project status.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my ongoing design request
I’d like an update on the status of my current design project for my veteran support initiative.
Check the current status of my active design project to retrieve the latest deliverable version, revision count, and ETA.
I’d like to check on the status of my existing design project.
I want to check the status of my existing research poster design project.
